author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: VisionHealthOne Corp Pte Ltd v HD Holdings Pte Ltd and others (Chan Wai Chuen and another, third parties)
counsel: Dinesh Dhillon and Lim Dao Kai (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the plaintiff; Tan Chee Meng SC, Josephine Choo, Emily Su, Quek Kian Teck and Roger Neo Li-Yang (WongPartnership LLP) for the first and third defendants; Gooi Chi Duan, Tin Keng Seng, Kang Yixian and Jessica Soo (Donaldson & Burkinshaw) for the second defendant; Lee Yih Gia (Veritas Law Corporation) for the third parties.
